modName: Burleigh and Stronginthearm Master Smithing Recipes
summary: Enjoy these crusader era inspired weapons as brought to you by Mr.Burleigh and Mr.Stronginthearm!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1161.photobucket.com/albums/q515/Dfac364/RRBlacksmithCover.jpg[/IMG]

Okay so this mod doesnt tie in much with discworld lore, it may be because i read too much but when I tried to come up with a name Mr.Burleigh and Mr.Stronginthearm are the only ones that came to mind.  Regardless this is still a pretty solid if rather small for the moment weapon pack of a crusades era inspired one hand sword, bastard sword, and shield, all balanced and made craftable simply by reading a copy of Burliegh and Stronginthearm\'s Advanced smithing Recipes as can be found at the riverwood trader.

================
Installation
================
Merge the downloaded data file with the steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder 
data file should contain the .esm file and a textures and meshes file


================
Mod Includes
================
-Cuinas: bastard sword
-Caldbolg: long sword
-Hadron\'s Shield
-Book: Advanced Smithing Recipes

================
Other Great Mods
================
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17569\"]Militarize Solitude[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17692\"]Legend of the Lost Sword[/url]

================
Special Thanks to
================
Too many people so ill just say everyone who has ever posted a tutorial or answered a question on the nexus
author: Dfac364
